MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the ML11 postcode area of Forth. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.35pm. We are continuing investigations onsite to find the cause of the low voltage issues our team are now working to get your power back to normal on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:41PM on Thursday 31 December 2020.
